Donghyeon

Group (2024-present):
KickFlip

Introduction

Donghyeon is a South Korean singer and dancer under JYP Entertainment. He is best known as a member of the boy group KickFlip.

He was revealed as a contestant on the SBS audition show Loud on May 20, 2021. In the final round, Donghyeon, along with four other members, won the online vote, securing their automatic inclusion in JYP Entertainment's upcoming boy group.
